foreignData.flavorText: Les clercs virent en elle un don du ciel. Elle ne voyait en eux que des alliés dans sa guerre contre Phage.

foreignData.flavorText: Os clérigos a viam como uma dádiva divina. Ela os via apenas como aliados em sua guerra contra Phage.

mainBoard.flavorText: "The hum of the universe is never off-key." —Mystic elder

foreignData.flavorText: „Die Musik des Universums klingt immer harmonisch." —Älterer Mystiker
foreignData.name: Astralrutsche
foreignData.text: Immer wenn ein Spieler eine Karte umwandelt, kannst du eine Kreatur deiner Wahl ganz aus dem Spiel entfernen. Falls du dies tust, bringe diese Kreatur am Ende des Zuges unter der Kontrolle seines Besitzers ins Spiel zurück.

foreignData.flavorText: "El tarareo del universo nunca desentona". Anciano místico
foreignData.name: Deslizamiento astral
foreignData.text: Siempre que un jugador use la habilidad de ciclo de una carta, puedes remover del juego la criatura objetivo. Si lo haces, regresa al juego bajo el control de su propietario esa criatura al final del turno.

foreignData.flavorText: « Le chant de l'univers ne connaît nulle fausse note. » —Un doyen des mystiques
foreignData.name: Glissement astral
foreignData.text: À chaque fois qu'un joueur recycle une carte, vous pouvez retirer la créature ciblée de la partie. Si vous faites ainsi, renvoyez en jeu cette créature sous le contrôle de son propriétaire à la fin du tour.

foreignData.flavorText: "Il brusio dell'universo non è mai stonato". —Anziano mistico
foreignData.name: Frana Astrale
foreignData.text: Ogniqualvolta un giocatore usa l'abilità ciclo di una carta, puoi rimuovere dal gioco una creatura bersaglio. Se lo fai, rimetti in gioco quella creatura sotto il controllo del suo proprietario alla fine del turno.

foreignData.flavorText: "O ressoar do universo nunca está fora de sintonia." — Ancião místico
foreignData.name: Deslizamento Astral
foreignData.text: Toda vez que um jogador reciclar um card você pode remover de jogo a criatura alvo. Se o fizer, devolva aquela criatura para o jogo sob o controle de seu dono no final do turno.

mainBoard.name: Astral Slide
mainBoard.originalText: Whenever a player cycles a card, you may remove target creature from the game. If you do, return that creature to play under its owner's control at end of turn.

rulings.text: If a player cycles a card during the end step, the creature that is exiled won’t come back until the end of the next turn.
If a face-down card is exiled, it turns face-up and remains face-up when it returns to the battlefield. This does not trigger any abilities that would trigger on it being turned face-up.

mainBoard.text: Whenever a player cycles a card, you may exile target creature. If you do, return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

mainBoard.flavorText: "We lay our dead to rest in a beautiful bed, in hopes that the Ancestor will think it a fit cradle for the next life." —Mystic elder

foreignData.flavorText: „Wir geben unseren Toten eine schöne Bettung und hoffen, dass die Ahnin dies als eine geeignete Wiege für das nächste Leben ansieht." —Älterer Mystiker
foreignData.name: Siegel des Tagesanbruchs
foreignData.text: Immer wenn eine Kreatur aus dem Spiel auf deinen Friedhof gelegt wird, kannst du {1}{W} bezahlen. Falls du dies tust, bringe jene Karte auf deine Hand zurück.

foreignData.flavorText: "Colocamos a nuestros muertos a descansar en una cama hermosa, con la esperanza de que la Antepasada la considere una cuna apropiada para la próxima vida". Anciano místico
foreignData.name: Sello del nuevo amanecer
foreignData.text: Siempre que una criatura vaya a tu cementerio desde el juego, puedes pagar {1}{W}. Si lo haces, regresa esa carta a tu mano.

foreignData.flavorText: « Nos morts reposent dans un magnifique lit, dans l'espoir que l'Ancêtre y voit un berceau parfait pour la vie prochaine. » —Un doyen des mystiques
foreignData.name: Sceau de l'Aube nouvelle
foreignData.text: À chaque fois qu'une créature est mise dans votre cimetière depuis le jeu, vous pouvez payer {1}{W}. Si vous faites ainsi, renvoyez cette carte dans votre main.

foreignData.flavorText: "Riponiamo i nostri morti a riposare in uno splendido letto, nella speranza che l'Antenata lo reputi una degna culla per la prossima vita". —Anziano mistico
foreignData.name: Sigillo della Nuova Alba
foreignData.text: Ogniqualvolta una creatura viene messa nel tuo cimitero dal gioco, puoi spendere {1}{W}. Se lo fai, riprendi in mano quella carta.

foreignData.flavorText: "Colocamos nossos mortos para descansar em lindas camas, esperando que a Ancestral as considere berços adequados para a próxima vida." — Ancião místico
foreignData.name: Chancela do Recomeço
foreignData.text: Toda vez que uma criatura for colocada em seu cemitério vinda de jogo, você pode pagar {1}{W}. Se o fizer, devolva aquele card para sua mão.

mainBoard.name: Sigil of the New Dawn
mainBoard.originalText: Whenever a creature is put into your graveyard from play, you may pay o1oW. If you do, return that card to your hand.

rulings.text: Sigil of the New Dawn’s ability triggers if a creature you own dies under another player’s control.
If a creature you own dies at the same time that Sigil of the New Dawn leaves the battlefield, Sigil of the New Dawn’s ability triggers for that creature.

mainBoard.text: Whenever a creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {1}{W}. If you do, return that card to your hand.

mainBoard.flavorText: "I can't hear them scream, but at least I don't have to listen to them beg." —Phage the Untouchable

foreignData.flavorText: „Ich kann sie leider nicht schreien hören, aber so bleibt mir auch ihr Betteln um Gnade erspart."—Phage die Unberührbare
foreignData.name: Ersticken
foreignData.text: Zerstöre eine Kreatur deiner Wahl mit umgewandelten Manakosten von 3 oder weniger. Sie kann nicht regeneriert werden.

foreignData.flavorText: "No puedo oírlos gritar, pero al menos no tengo que oírlos rogar". Phage la Intocable
foreignData.name: Producir asfixia
foreignData.text: Destruye la criatura objetivo con un coste de maná convertido de 3 ó menos. No puede ser regenerada.

foreignData.flavorText: « Je n'ai plus le plaisir de les entendre hurler, mais je n'ai plus à subir leurs incessantes suppliques. »— Phage l'Intouchable
foreignData.name: Étouffer
foreignData.text: Détruisez la créature ciblée dont le coût converti de mana est de 3 ou moins. Elle ne peut pas être régénérée.

foreignData.flavorText: "Non posso gustarmi le loro urla, ma almeno non devo sopportare le loro suppliche". —Phage l'Intoccabile
foreignData.name: Strangolare
foreignData.text: Distruggi una creatura bersaglio con costo di mana convertito pari o inferiore a 3. Non può essere rigenerata.

foreignData.flavorText: "Eu não posso ouvi-los gritar, mas ao menos não preciso ouvi-los implorar." —Phage a Intocável
foreignData.name: Sufocamento
foreignData.text: Destrói a criatura alvo cujo custo de mana convertido seja 3 ou menos. Ela não pode ser regenerada.

mainBoard.name: Smother
mainBoard.originalText: Destroy target creature with converted mana cost 3 or less. It can't be regenerated.

rulings.text: A creature’s converted mana cost is determined solely by the mana symbols printed in its upper right corner (unless that creature is copying something else; see below). If its mana cost includes {X}, X is considered to be 0. If it has no mana symbols in its upper right corner (because it’s an animated land, for example), its converted mana cost is 0. Ignore any alternative costs or additional costs (such as kicker) paid when the creature was cast.
A token has a converted mana cost of 0, unless it is copying something else.
If a creature is copying something else, its converted mana cost is the converted mana cost of whatever it’s copying.

mainBoard.text: Destroy target creature with converted mana cost 3 or less. It can't be regenerated.

mainBoard.flavorText: Few who cross Phage have the chance to repeat the mistake.

foreignData.flavorText: Wenige, die Phage über den Weg laufen, haben die Gelegenheit, diesen Fehler noch einmal zu machen.

mainBoard.name: Death Pulse
mainBoard.originalText:
Target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn.
Cycling o1oBoB (o1oBoB, Discard this card from your hand: Draw a card.)
When you cycle Death Pulse, you may have target creature get -1/-1 until end of turn.

rulings.text: Cycling is an activated ability. Effects that interact with activated abilities (such as Stifle or Rings of Brighthearth) will interact with cycling. Effects that interact with spells (such as Remove Soul or Faerie Tauntings) will not.

When you cycle this card, first the cycling ability goes on the stack, then the triggered ability goes on the stack on top of it. The triggered ability will resolve before you draw a card from the cycling ability.

The cycling ability and the triggered ability are separate. If the triggered ability doesn’t resolve (due to being countered with Stifle, for example, or if all its targets have become illegal), the cycling ability will still resolve and you’ll draw a card.
You can cycle this card even if there are no targets for the triggered ability. That’s because the cycling ability itself has no targets.

mainBoard.text:
Target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn.
Cycling {1}{B}{B} ({1}{B}{B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle Death Pulse, you may have target creature get -1/-1 until end of turn.

mainBoard.flavorText: "We have ways to make you talk, but you have nothing interesting to say."

foreignData.flavorText: „Wir könnten dich zum Reden bringen, aber anscheinend hast du uns nichts Interessantes zu erzählen."
foreignData.name: Gottlose Gebete
foreignData.text: Die Gottlosen Gebete fügen einer Kreatur oder einem Spieler deiner Wahl X Schadenspunkte zu und du erhältst X Lebenspunkte dazu, wobei X gleich der Anzahl an Klerikern im Spiel ist.

foreignData.flavorText: "Tenemos maneras de hacerte hablar, pero no tienes nada interesante que decir".
foreignData.name: Plegarias profanas
foreignData.text: Las Plegarias profanas hacen X puntos de daño a la criatura o jugador objetivo y ganas X vidas, donde X es el número de Clérigos en juego.

foreignData.flavorText: « Nous avons les moyens de vous faire parler, mais vous n'avez rien d'intéressant à nous apprendre. »
foreignData.name: Prières profanes
foreignData.text: Les Prières profanes infligent X blessures à une cible, créature ou joueur, et vous gagnez X points de vie, X étant le nombre de clercs en jeu.

foreignData.flavorText: "Sappiamo come farti parlare, ma tu non hai niente di interessante da dirci".
foreignData.name: Preghiere Profane

foreignData.flavorText: "Temos meios de fazer-te falar, mas não tens nada de interessante a dizer."
foreignData.name: Preces Profanas
foreignData.text: Preces Profanas causa X pontos de dano à criatura alvo ou ao jogador alvo e você ganha X pontos de vida, sendo X igual ao número de Clérigos em jogo.

mainBoard.text: Profane Prayers deals X damage to any target and you gain X life, where X is the number of Clerics on the battlefield.
